titles.title: Don't Be Discouraged, Don't Be Dismayed

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Don't be discouraged, don't be dismayed.
If the goal before you seems far away,
Look all around you; you'll surely find
Each growing thing takes one step at a time.
You can only take one step, one step at a time
To walk out of a valley, or a mountain to climb.
At each day's dawning you'll surely find
You can only take one step, one step at a time.
